desc: Binary search compares the target value to the middle element of the array. If they are not equal, the half where target cannot be in is eliminated and the search continues on the remaining half repeating this until the target value is found. If the search ends with the remaining half being empty, the target is not in the array.
pseudo:
binarySearch(arr, x, low, high)
 repeat till low = high
  mid = (low + high)/2
  if (x == arr[mid])
   return mid
  else if (x > arr[mid])
   low = mid + 1
  else
   high = mid - 1
